Grouping Elements

There once was a dog who loved steaks. He was frequently spotted at the finest steakhouse in town sitting in his reserved table.

*scene change* At home the dog sits at his monitor and sees his investments have payed off handsomely. With this money he can buy more steaks tomorrow. Yes!
